summary: Should increase your FPS for the Pineapplevision ENB by JoPineapples68
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=orange][size=6]PINEAPPLEVISION ENB[/size][size=5]
Performance Boost!!![/size][/color][/center]



[b][size=2][color=yellow][u]Features:[/color][/u][/size][/b]
Should increase your FPS for PINEAPPLEVISION ENB
I get about 25-38 FPS with my modified ini file on an old graphic card ( HD 4890)
Without i got only 15-25, so give it a try ;)
Please tell me if it works for you too and upload some images!

[b][size=2][color=yellow][u]My PC specifications are:[/color][/u][/size][/b]
[b][u]Processor:[/u][/b] Intel Core i5 750
[b][u]Graphic Card:[/u][/b] ATI Radeon HD 4890
[b][u]RAM:[/u][/b] 4GB
And I play at 1080p, AA and AF deactivated, [b][color=green]SYNERGY 1.3A[/b][/color]

[b][size=2][color=yellow][u]Installation:[/color][/u][/size][/b]
-I recomend the newest ENB, so download it pls [url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm]here[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20741]PINEAPPLEVISION ENB[/url] is needed too
-Extract the enbseries.ini file from the archive
-IMPORTANT -> Backup your file first
-Drop the enbseries.ini in your Skyrim MAIN folder and overwrite your current enbseries.ini file
-Also download this generally [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21427]FPS Booster[/url] [b][color=yellow]NOTE:[/color][/b] With this booster DOF is not available, but you may gain a FPS increase of about 5FPS
-Rename the d3d9.dll from this file to booster_d3d9.dll [b] [color=yellow]IMPORTANT:[/b][/color] DON\'T rename the original enb d3d9.dll file, also be sure you rename it exacty to the above told name, wont work if you don\'t
-Drop it in your Skyrim MAIN folder

[color=green][size=2]ENJOY! :)[/size][/color]

Rate and comment, maybe we can tune it a bit more together :)

[b][color=yellow][u]My Mods:[/b][/u] [size=0.5](Click the images)[/size][/color]
